title: Standard
lyrics:
3 ContributorsStandard Lyrics[Intro: Knucks]
Ayy, uh

[Verse 1: Knucks]
Life's been treating me nice
Put a peppermint leaf in my tea with the ice
It's like I need me some legal advice
'Cause I came in the game like a thief in the night
If you tryna get a feature of mine
Better get that shit now, what a reasonable time
My time ain't stop climbing and neither's my price
Took her out once, but I'm jeeting it twice
It was twice that I almost lost it, cost it
Had to took a toll in profit, fuck it
Do it on my own and buss it, watch it
Finna make 'em troll and gossip
How many timеs was I left outside?
Need a heatеr and a vest outside
You was watching and hoping I clock it
In the left seat of your best friend's ride

[Chorus: Knucks]
Make a dime on my line, that's standard
Shorty wanna vibe with the guy, that's standards
Chatting bare online, I can't stand it
Bell up the mandem, brush 'em up standard
I just can't understand it
Silly advice, tryna lower my standards
Come on, baby, look at the standard
They cannot find this standard, ayy
You might also like[Verse 2: Knucks]
Kinda like my sound, I'm grounded
Man are moving wild when they out and it's childish
The barrel that's empty will rattle the loudest
Think abourrit
Ayy, soon I'm gonna need an accountant
Know the amount's the amount 'cause I counted (Counted)
Ain't no other way that's around it ('Round it)
Shit came that way when I found it
They wanna question my approach
Burn your opinions down to the roach
Bro, I was in the shower at home
True say I should've met her two hours ago (Ayy)
Shorty wanna out me, I know
Getting high when we in, take her out on the low
Pull up to the crib, get you out of your clothes
I can't really say where your trousers'll go

[Chorus: Knucks]
Make a dime on my line, that's standard
Shorty wanna vibe with the guy, that's standards
Chatting bare online, I can't stand it
Bell up the mandem, brush 'em up standard
I just can't understand it
Silly advice, tryna lower my standards
Come on, baby, look at the standard
They cannot find this standard2Embed
